title: changeOD
text: 2011 data taken open access data provided WICID service downloaded function get_od pct package. data available WICID based 2011 Census. data available local authority level includes following variables (removing unwanted variables): geo_code1: Origin code geo_code2: Destination code from_home: Working home light_rail: Underground, metro, light rail, tram train: Train bus: Bus taxi: Taxi motorbike: Motorcycle, scooter moped car_driver: Driving car van car_passenger: Passenger car van bicycle: Bicycle foot: foot : method travel work

title: changeOD
text: See data WICID (requires login data mode). open access OD data can obtained follows link: WICID. undertook following steps process data: Download data WICID service. Read data R. Check structure data. Check cross-tabulation mode Aggregate data mode travel remove unwanted places work. Pivot data wider match 2011 dataset. Change names match 2011 dataset. Compare 2021 2011 datasets.
